key_risks: High dependency on advertising revenue (60% of total revenue), making the company vulnerable to market fluctuations and regulatory changes

Exposure to economic and political instability in emerging markets, which are key growth areas for Opera
Stagnant global browser market share (8%), indicating limited growth opportunities
controversies: Privacy concerns related to data collection practices and partnerships with third-party advertisers
Scrutiny over Chinese ownership and potential data-sharing practices, despite privacy-focused features
social_issues: Potential erosion of user trust due to privacy concerns and data collection practices
Regulatory challenges related to compliance with privacy laws (e.g., GDPR, CCPA)
governance_issues: Concerns over transparency and data governance due to Chinese ownership and potential data-sharing practices
